THIS UPDATE:

  • Added chat commands to control the streamers Sphere, Type !jump, !back, !left, !right, !go to control the host/streamers Sphere (Balls)( Don’t let the host win!!!!)
  • Added Yosemite Map
  • Added Sounds to Yosemite Map
  • Baked all lighting
  • Optimized for better frame rate
  • Added Boosters to Yosemite
  • Added new chat commands
  • Local Leader Board optomized

** NOT ALL SOUNDS WORKS - THIS IS PRE- ALPHA- PROTOTYPE ALL FUN AND GAMES INDIE GAME DEV!

HOW TO PLAY WITH OTHER VIEWERS ON TWITCH:

Switch Game Category in Twitch to Sphere This!

After game launch, Type !Play on your Twitch chat channel to join race! 

Other Commands:

!race
!cam
!jump

RUNS BEST ON 1080 FULL SCREEN!
